cheatsheet:
Create a simple XContext named coursesCtx.bucx
Create a new XContext named "coursesCtx.bucx" within the "Club" project using the New File wizard. Important: A pop-up dialog will be displayed asking to convert the "Club" project to XText project, please answer Yes.
<item skip="false" title="Step 2. Set the content of courseCtx.Set the content of "coursesCtx.bucx" as follows.
context coursesCtx
sets CRS
constants m
axioms
@axm0_1: finite(CRS)
@axm0_2: m ∈ ℕ1
theorem @thm0_1: 0 < m
endescription>
AutomatAutomatically format the content of "coursesCtx.bucx" using short-cut (e.g., on Mac OS: Cmd+Shift+F). Save the resulting file.escription>
Save the file "coursesCtx.bucx".
